src_original: kāyaṃ niśritya vartate /  tasmādāśvāsapraśvāsāḥ kāyasaṃskāra ityucyate //
tgt_original: 云何身行？ 入息出息是身行法。 所以者何？ 是法屬身，故名身行。

src_original: vitarkayitvā vicārayitvā vācaṃ bhāṣate,  nāvitarkayitvā, nāvicārya /  tasmādvitarkavicāro vāksaṃskāra ityucyate //
tgt_original: 有覺有觀，是作覺觀已，然後口語，若無覺觀則無言說，是謂口行。

src_original: ṣaḍ vijñānakāyāḥ /  katame ṣaṭ? tadyathā - cakṣurvijñānam /  śrotravijñānam /  ghrāṇavijñānam /  jihvāvijñānam /  kāyavijñānam /

tgt_original: 眼識乃至意識，是名六識。

src_original: (ī) vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpamiti /  tatra nāmarūpam - nāma catvāro 'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ /
vedanāskandhaḥ /  saṃjñāskandhaḥ /  saṃskāraskandhaḥ /  vijñānaskandhaḥ /  idaṃ (AvSū, Vaidya 313) nāma /
yatkiṃcidrūpam,  taccatvāri mahābhūtāni /  catvāri ca mahābhūtānyupādāya /
tgt_original: 一切色四大及造色，是謂色。 云何四大？

src_original: yadgurutvaṃ ca karkaśatvaṃ ca /  abdhātuḥ katamaḥ?  yad dravatvamabhiṣyandanatvaṃ ca /  tejodhātuḥ katamaḥ?  yaduṣṇatvaṃ paripācanatvaṃ ca /
tgt_original: 堅重相者地，濡濕相者水，熱相者火，輕動相者風。

src_original: yadidaṃ rūpaṃ pūrvakaṃ (ca)  nāma, tadubhayamekatrābhisaṃkṣipya nāmarūpamityucyate //
śrotrāyatanam /  ghrāṇāyatanam /  jihvāyatanam /  kāyāyatanam /  manaāyatanam /  idamucyate ṣaḍāyatanam //
tgt_original: 眼內入乃至意內入，是名六入。

src_original: sparśaḥ katamaḥ?  ṣaṭ sparśakāyāḥ - cakṣusaṃsparśaḥ /  katame(māḥ?)ṣaṭ?  cakṣuḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sukhā duḥkhā aduḥkhāsukhā ca /

tgt_original: 上至他化自在天，是名欲有，及其能生業。

src_original: śubhakṛtsnāḥ /  anabhrakāḥ /  puṇyaprasavāḥ  / abṛhāḥ / atapāḥ /  abṛhāḥ /  sudarśanāḥ /  akaniṣṭhāśceti //  ārūpyadhātavaḥ katamāḥ?
tadyathā - (AvSū, Vaidya 314)  ākāśānantyāyatanam /  vijñānānantyāyatanam /  ākiṃcanyāyatanam /  naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam //
tgt_original: 從虛空乃至非有想非無想處，是名無色有。

src_original: avakrāntiḥ,  abhinirvṛttiḥ,  skandhānāṃ prādurbhāvaḥ,  āyatanānāṃ pratilambhaḥ,  jīvitendriyasyodbhavaḥ /  (iyamucyate jātiḥ /) //
tgt_original: 種種眾生處處生出，有受陰得持得入得命，是名生。
生因緣老死。 云何老？
